reviewText: I'm a big fan of Richard Coyle but was MOST disappointed in this movie and his performance in it!  Very predictable storyline. Overall extremely boring.
good movie to watch if you like action

I thought the movie was okay but nothing spectacular. Richard Coyle did a god job of acting in what is now a run of the mill subject with no where to go, as everyone else has put out stuff on this subject dozens of times over.
I love the writer of this movie, good film. I would recommend to anyone who is a fan of Nicolas Winding Refn
I watched this at my friend's house out of luck, and I have loved it since then. I finally managed to get a hold of the DVD and have added it to my collection.

This is a pretty good movie about a pusher under pressure to deliever on a debt. I found it interesting that this guy doesn't get high on his own supply. I think he might get high pushing the edge of his own envelope.

This film didn't need to be made and was not as good as the original.  I got more 'real' feeling from the original and I thought it was way better done than this movie.  If it ain't broke, don't fix it.  Go watch the original instead.

Everything you want in a good film. It looks stunning, has top-notch performances from Richard Coyle and Agyness Deyn, adrenaline fuelled ride action thriller... and executive produced by Nicolas Winding Refn!
